byline.original: By CHRIS BUCKLEY and JANE PERLEZ

lead_paragraph: The defense budget will rise by 7 to 8 percent this year, less than the double-digit increases that have been the norm for years, a senior official said Friday.

headline.main: China Plans Modest Rise in Military Spending
headline.print_headline: China Plans Modest Rise in Military Spending

snippet: The defense budget will rise by 7 to 8 percent this year, less than the double-digit increases that have been the norm for years, a senior official said Friday.
